title: Oort, the Web3 Data Infrastructure
content:
Decentralized, Secure & Reliable– Powered by tens of thousands of nodes around the globe, our storage solution offers broad geo-coverage with great scalability
– AWS-comparable performance
– All data is split into different pieces, encrypted and stored in multiple locations to prevent any potential data loss
